body_html:
Thanks anyway. I switched to use sub shell call instead of multi-processing.

Unfortunately, I cannot use allow_growth now. Version 0.7.1 and current master HEAD seem to have a serious performance problem in some ops, split, reshape or concat(about 20 times slower, I am sure I am using GPU). I fall back to 0.6.0 now. Do not have time to check where goes wrong yet.

body:
Thanks anyway. I switched to use sub shell call instead of multi-processing.

Unfortunately, I cannot use allow_growth now. Version 0.7.1 and current master HEAD seem to have a serious performance problem in some ops, split, reshape or concat(about 20 times slower, I am sure I am using GPU). I fall back to 0.6.0 now. Do not have time to check where goes wrong yet.
